article:
Many students like watching TV very much. But _ Monday to Friday,they must go to school. So on Saturday and Sunday they stay at home and _ TV from morning to night. They don't know it's bad for their eyes . Usually children like to eat fish, meat and chicken, but they don't like vegetables _ fruit. They don't know eating more _ and fruit is better than(***) eating meat.
At school the children only do a few minutes of _ or _ do any sports. The teachers must know it isn't good for _ health.
We always think of ways to keep _ We must eat much vegetables and fruit,do enough   sports every day. And we should watch TV and read in right ways.
